name: FeedTheCat
description:
Here's my game, "Feed the cat". This game was developed during Ludum Dare jam event (#LudumDare34). Feed the cat with mice, birds and fishes but don't let the cat get hit by the balls of wool. You have three lives. The cat is very hungry, so try to catch as many animals as you can. Don't forget to turn your sound on.

I hope you will like it.

Theme: Two button controls

Controls: Arrow keys (up and down)

Used Technologies: Kha2D-Engine (http://tech.ktxsoftware.com)

Made by Polona Caserman
